dataset.title: Advisory Alerts
dataset.description: Contents: Alerts sent out broadly to the public at large or to specific groups related to specific ethics issues. - Purpose: Timely alerts to inform the public of specific ethics issues without waiting for a regularly scheduled Board meeting.
dataset.describedByType: Combination of Scanned and Searchable PDFs

dataset.title: Lobbyist Registration (2014 - Present)
dataset.description: Contents: Information on lobbyist, lobbying firms, and principals conducting lobbying in the City. - Purpose:  - Additional Comments: Data is accurate in so far as it is the data entered by the filers.  However, data is not normalized so multiple variations of a name or address may exist in the database.

dataset.title: Lobbyist Registration (2012 - 2013)
dataset.description: Contents: Information on lobbyist, lobbying firms, and principals conducting lobbying in the City. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Lobbyist Activity/Expenditures (2012 - 2013)
dataset.description: Contents: Information on lobbying activity by principals, lobbyists, and lobbying firms. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Advice/Opinion Archive
dataset.description: Contents: Legal Opinions responding to requests for advice.  Can be either Opinions from the Board or Opinions from the Board's General Counsel. - Purpose: Data is used for legal research on the application of the City's Ethics Code and other public integrity laws under the Board's purview to specific fact patterns. - Additional Comments: Requestors can ask for Non-Public opinions, in which case the Opinion will be redacted to remove the identity of the requestor before being published.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: New Opinions are posted timely upon their approval by the Board and General Counsel.
dataset.describedByType: Combination of Scanned and Searchable PDFs

dataset.title: Advice/Opinion Indices
dataset.description: Contents: Index of Board and General Counsel Opinions including abbreviated descriptions, keywords, and citations to applicable laws and regulations. - Purpose: Guides for navigating the archive of Opinions, using keywords and citations. - Additional Comments: Currently there are separate indices for each year.

dataset.title: Campaign Finance Reports
dataset.description: Contents: Database of campaign finance report information provided by candidates and political committees about contributions and expenditures. - Purpose:  - Additional Comments: Stored by the Department of Records
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Continuously for database, updated each reporting cycle for the ftp site.
dataset.describedByType: PDF, plus TXT files on an ftp site

dataset.title: Settlement Agreements
dataset.description: Contents: Settlement Agreements approved by the Board. - Purpose:
dataset.describedByType: Combination of Scanned and Searchable PDFs

dataset.title: Public Meeting Minutes
dataset.description: Contents: Minutes approved by the Board of monthly public meetings. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Public Meeting Schedules
dataset.description: Contents: Schedule approved by the Board of monthly public meetings for the year. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Regulations
dataset.description: Contents: Regulations approved by the Board. - Purpose:  - Additional Comments: Filed with the Department of Records

dataset.title: Press Releases
dataset.description: Contents: Board press releases - Purpose: General Board press releases.
dataset.describedByType: Combination of Scanned and Searchable PDFs

dataset.title: Lobbyist Activity/Expenditures (2014 - Present)
dataset.description: Contents: Information on lobbying activity by principals, lobbyists, and lobbying firms. - Purpose:
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Initial expense report updated quarterly, then updated continuously for amendments.

dataset.title: Budget Documents
dataset.description: Contents: Materials related to annual budget process, audits, etc. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Financial Disclosure Statements
dataset.description: Contents: Statements of Financial Interest required either by the Ethics Code, the Mayor's Executive Order, and/or the State Ethics Act. - Purpose:  - Additional Comments: Stored by the Department of Records
dataset.describedByType: Scanned PDF, plus 87% electronically filed in a Database

dataset.title: Public Hearing Transcripts
dataset.description: Contents: Transcripts of public hearings held by the Board as part of the process of creating and amending regulations. - Purpose: Public Hearings are required to provide the public with an opportunity to offer testimony upon new or amended Regulations.  The Transcripts are appended to the official Hearing Report. - Additional Comments: Stored by the Department of Records

dataset.title: Candidate Registration Statements
dataset.description: Contents: This is a form filed when a candidate registers to run in an election. - Purpose: These forms are required to be filed with our office by under state law. Externally, potential candidates and campaigns may find this information useful when considering their opponents.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: When individuals file to become candidates, usually prior to each Election

dataset.title: Corridor Cleaning Grant Guidelines & Restrictions
dataset.description: Contents: A description of the program, requirements, outcomes, and qualifications - Purpose: This information is used by non-profit organizations that wish to apply for funding

dataset.title: OEO Annual Report for all Public Works Contracts
dataset.description: Contents: Committed amounts of minority and women owned business participation on City contracts across all departments, regardless of contract value - Purpose: Monitoring and oversight

dataset.title: Corridor Cleaning Grant Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents: number of trash bags collected and number of problems/complaints reported to 311 - Purpose: Data is used to report to HUD, city officals, and funders

dataset.title: Empowerment Zone Neighborhood Funding Stream Program Balances
dataset.description: Contents: Funding related information for assets managed internally or by a 3rd party such as Vanguard - Purpose:

dataset.title: Empowerment Zone Neighborhood Funding Stream Program Grant Recipients
dataset.description: Contents: Recipients of Empowerment Zone Grant monies, the awarded amount, and address of the organization. - Purpose:

dataset.title: Business Technical Assistance Program Grant Guidelines & Qualifications
dataset.description: Contents: A description of the program, requirements, outcomes, and qualifications - Purpose: This information is used by non-profit organization that wish to apply for funding
dataset.rights: once a contract is award, data ca be seen by other city departments

dataset.title: InStore Grant Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents: Contains information about the applicant, business, project, and costs. - Purpose: Used for tracking new, ongoing, and completed projects; including tracking amounts paid.
dataset.rights: The data can be shared, but the database itself should not be

dataset.title: Real Estate Development Checklist
dataset.description: Contents: A checklist of most common permits and reviews for large-scale development in the city. - Purpose: A resource to share with developers we meet with as well as an online resource for a developer of any scale. - Additional Comments: This checklist is still in development. The draft is being vetted by the various departments that are referenced.
dataset.rights: Data can be shared internally and with the public.

dataset.title: Storefront Improvement Grant Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents: Contains information about the applicant, business, project, and costs. - Purpose: Used for tracking new, ongoing, and completed projects; including tracking amounts paid.
dataset.rights: The data can be shared, but the database itself should not be

dataset.title: Agency Specific Participation Reports
dataset.description: Contents: Data collected from payment systems to assess the amounts committed to M/W/DSBEs. - Purpose: Eventually published as part of the OEO annual report.

dataset.title: Annual Disparity Report
dataset.description: Contents: Primarily the data from the participation report and EOP report, analyzed and translated into summary statistics - Purpose: To establish appropriate goal levels for City contracts. Disparity is caclulated by by dividing utilization of M/W/DSBE firms by availibility of M/W/DSBE firms to develop an index; index greater than 1 is overutilization, less than 1 is underutilization.
dataset.temporal: Given fiscal year of the report
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Report published annually, data maintained constantly
dataset.systemOfRecords: Internally Excel, externally STATA and Excel

dataset.title: Annual EOP Report
dataset.description: Contents: Includes the average participation of minority and woman owned businesses (M/WBEs) on City, Private/Non Profit, and quasi-public projects. For Private/NP lists the name of the project, construction dates, cost, committed participation and actual participation; for City projects lists the name of the project, construction dates, cost, prime and sub contractors, committed participation and actual participation; for quasi-public projects lists the name of the project, cost, comitted participation and actual participation. For all projects the difference between commited and actual participation is calculated and listed as the "variance." - Purpose: This information is used to guage inclusion performance by City departments, prime contractors, private and NP project owners, and quasi-public departments. This information also informs OEO's goal setting for certain projects.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: For commitment numbers, as often as new EOPs are generated -- sometimes weekly. For actual performance numbers, annually for City and quasi-public departments (though OEO is trying to figure out a way to make this more frequent) and quarterly for private/NP.

dataset.title: Business Service Manager Activities
dataset.description: Contents: Containts information about the address, company, and reason for inquiry. - Purpose: Used for internal tracking, resource deployment, and reporting - Additional Comments: Client information received via hotline is voluntary, therefore complete information may not be obtained
dataset.describedByType: Can be exported to spreadsheet/csv file

dataset.title: Business Technical Assistance Program Grant Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents: # served that recieve technical assistance, loans, or create jobs:  1) low to low moderate income residents who want to start or expand a micro-enterprise and 2) businesses that serve low to low moderate income residents who are micro-entrprises  - Purpose: Data is used to report to HUD, city officals, and funders

dataset.title: Community Oversight Committee Notes
dataset.description: Contents: Reports provided by third party constultants on M/W/DSBE and workforce participation on private/NP projects with EOPs - Purpose: Monitoring and oversight
dataset.systemOfRecords: Physical and scanned copies, information is being entered into EOP database

dataset.title: Corridor Management Grant Guidelines & Restrictions
dataset.description: Contents: A description of the program, requirements, outcomes, and qualifications - Purpose: This information is used by non-profit organizations that wish to apply for funding

dataset.title: Corridor Management Grants Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents: Performance metrics for the organizations participating in the corridor management grant program, reported to Commerce quarterly by grant recipients. - Purpose: Data is used to report to HUD, city officals, and funders

dataset.title: InStore Grant Guidelines & Restrictions
dataset.description: Contents: A description of the program, requirements, outcomes, and qualifications - Purpose: This information is used to market to and inform entities that wish to apply for funding
dataset.rights: The data can be shared, but the database itself should not be

dataset.title: NED Grant Program Funded Projects
dataset.description: Contents: Contains information about the applicant, business, project, and costs. - Purpose: Used for tracking status of projects (that are often multi-year).

dataset.title: Quasi City Agency EOP Reporting
dataset.description: Contents: List of projects originating within OHCD/PRA (Office of Housing & Community Development/Philadelphia Redevelopment Authority) that require EOPs. Includes estimated budget of projects, goals for and actual participation of M/W/DSBE firms on those projects. - Purpose: Monitoring and oversight. Also included in the EOP report.

dataset.title: Storefront Improvement Grants Guidelines & Restrictions
dataset.description: Contents: A description of the program, requirements, outcomes, and qualifications - Purpose: This information is used to market to and inform entities that wish to apply for funding
dataset.rights: The data can be shared, but the database itself should not be

dataset.title: Streetscape Projects/Capital Improvement Guidelines & Restrictions
dataset.description: Contents: Capital Funding Guidelines, One page program description, Process description and list of recently completed and projects underway - Purpose: Used for tracking new, ongoing, and completed projects
dataset.rights: Data can be shared internally. May need to be formatted in a more user friendly way to be publicly shared

dataset.title: Streetscape Projects/Capital Improvement Outcomes
dataset.description: Contents:  - Purpose:  - Additional Comments: Finance required an ROI analysis from us as a pilot and will be requiring this in upcoming years
dataset.rights: Data can be shared internally. May need to be formatted in a more user friendly way to be publicly shared
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Not updated, but may be required again

dataset.title: Survey Data
dataset.description: Contents: Information provided by the Corridor Management Grant Recipients regarding commercial vacancy, building conditions, commercial uses, and overall condition of the commercial corridor. - Purpose: Used for internal tracking, resource deployment, and reporting

dataset.title: Security Camera Incentive Program
dataset.description: Contents: Information regarding the # of recipients of grant monies for the Business Security Camera Program.  - Purpose: Used for tracking new, ongoing, and completed projects; including tracking amounts paid. - Additional Comments: Names/Addresses of camera locations cannot be made public.

dataset.title: Minority Owned Business Registry
dataset.description: Contents: A list of businesses that are recognized by the City as minority, women, or disabled-owned. The list ranges from contractors and construction firms to proffesional services to food service. The registry is maintained by Alice Dungee James. - Purpose: The OEO specialists use the registry to inform their goal setting on City projects. The registry is also used as a resource in looking for firms that provide a particular service.

dataset.title: Business Attraction & Retention Completed Projects
dataset.description: Contents: Companies that the Business Attraction and Rention unit has actively worked with to facilitate coming to the City - Purpose: Development Initiatives unit of Commerce

dataset.title: KOZ Program Applications
dataset.description: Contents: List of applicants to the State's KOZ program, includes date of application, date of acceptance/rejection, amount of investment, number of jobs reported at the close of the year - Purpose: KOZ corrdinator uses this data to track administrative todos, as well as some outcomes
dataset.modified: Currently undergoing updates since we're in an active application period
dataset.rights: Sharable, although some company information may not be public
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Updated annually as needed throughout the multi-month applciation process

dataset.title: Selected Real Estate Development Projects
dataset.description: Contents: Contains information about the address, company, square footage, project costs and project status for select developments. This is a record of significant projects related to economic development in Philadelphia. - Purpose: Internal tracking of current and completed large scale real estate development projects. - Additional Comments: Not a complete list of active development projects gleaned from multiple sources, including media reports
dataset.temporal: 2012 to present, with some projects back to 2010
dataset.describedByType: Can be exported to spreadsheet/csv file

dataset.title: Real Estate Development Committee Meeting Participants
dataset.description: Contents: 5-10 projects a year are presented in front of a committee of PECO, Streets, L&I, the Governor's Action Team, etc. These meetings coordinate department responses to real estate development projects and include discussions of plans and obstacles in development. A full list of Committee Members is available at http://www.phila.gov/commerce/realEstate/developerServices/Pages/DeveloperServicesCommittee.aspx  - Purpose: Developer Services uses this information to track and assist projects.

dataset.title: OEM Deployments
dataset.description: Contents: Deployment locations - Purpose: Emergency planning - situational awareness - Additional Comments: OEM_DEPLOYMENTS
dataset.rights: Removal of some features would make this approved for public release.

dataset.title: Community Locations
dataset.description: Contents: This data set shows locations of community facilities throughout the City of Philadelphia that require special consideration in assessing an emergency. - Purpose: Emergency planning - situational awareness

dataset.title: CIKR - Critical Infrastructure (Private)
dataset.description: Contents: Critical Infrastructure are the assets, systems, and networks, whether physical or virtual, so vital to the United States that their incapacitation or destruction would have a debilitating effect on security, national economic security, public health or safety, or any combination thereof. Key Resources are publicly or privately controlled resources essential to the minimal operations of the economy and government.The PrimarySector field organizes these data into DHS defined asset categories. - Purpose: Emergency planning - situational awareness - Additional Comments: CIKR

dataset.title: Election Board Training
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is currently the number of individuals who attended a particular location for training. An aspirational aspect of this data is to organize it by the individual's location or by the time of the seminar. - Purpose: This data is used to track the number of people attending trainings, project costs of training, and assess the effectiveness of providing certain days and timeslots for training.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Each week training is scheduled, usually a two month period leading up to each election

dataset.title: Machine Results
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is currently a text file of the machine vote election results. In the near future the data will be available on a web application and can be downloaded as a csv or excel file. - Purpose: The election results from the machines are used to compile the overall election results used to certify the election. This data is also used by candidates and campaigns.

dataset.title: Voting Machine Warehouse Database
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is a spreadsheet of the number of machines sent to each division. - Purpose: This data is used to haul the proper machines to each polling place and to determine how many Machine Inspectors are allowed for each division.

dataset.title: Election Results for Committee People
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is a list of elected Committee People by ward, division, and party. - Purpose: This data is used to certify the election for Committeeperson and is used by the politicial parties to organize.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: Updated once every four years after each election for Committeeperson

dataset.title: Elected/Court Appointment Results for the Election Board
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is a collection of the elected and court appointed Election Board Officials - Purpose: Internally, this data is used to identify where there may be vacancies or a shortage of board workers in divisions across the city. Externally, this data is sued to identify vacancies to get court appointments.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: When individuals resign or are appointed, usually prior to each Election

dataset.title: Absentee Ballots Requested/Returned
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is a collection of names and numbers of individuals who requested and/or returned Absentee Ballots in a particular election. This data can be broken down at various geographic levels. - Purpose: Internally, the data is used to keep track of how many absentee ballots are being processed. The level of interest in absentee ballots may be an indication of the expected turnout for Election Day. Externally, campaigns may be interested in this data to target voters who are in the process of voting by absentee ballot.

dataset.title: Provisional Ballot Results
dataset.description: Contents: This data set includes the election results of voters who voted by Provisional Ballot in a particular election. This data can be broken down at various geographic levels. - Purpose: The election results from the provisional ballots are used to compile the overall election results used to certify the election. This data is also used by candidates and campaigns.

dataset.title: Provisional Ballot Breakdown
dataset.description: Contents: This data set conains the number of provisional ballots submitted. It can be broken down by category and outcome. - Purpose: This information is submitted to the Department of State.

dataset.title: Candidates
dataset.description: Contents: This data set can be collected in a way to include the names and numbers of candidates. This data can be broken down at various geographic levels. - Purpose: Internally, this information is used to create the ballot. Externally, candidates and campaigns will want to know who their opponents are.

dataset.title: Poll Watcher Certificates
dataset.description: Contents: This data are in the format of requests (excel, fax, handwritten). Can be organized by request or by the geographic location of the recipient of the certificate. - Purpose: This data is used to create and track Poll Watcher Certificates. Candidates and Campaigns may be interested in this information to see where their opponents are placing poll watchers.

dataset.title: Petition Signatures
dataset.description: Contents: This data are in the format of forms that are filled out by hand. They contain names, addresses, and signatures for individuals who signed petitions to get candidates on the ballot. - Purpose: This data is used to determine if an individual is able to get on the ballot. Candidates use this informatio to challenge potential opponents.

dataset.title: Streets List
dataset.description: Contents: Street lists are paper copies of all registered voters broken down by division, in street and house order. - Purpose: Street lists are used by campaigns and political parties to reach voters.

dataset.title: Election Payroll Check Registry
dataset.description: Contents: See Election Board Officials who worked on Election Day. - Purpose: This data is used to pay Election Board Workers and track when checks are issued in case they are not received by the worker.

dataset.title: Amount of Money Raised
dataset.description: Contents: Currently this data is available for the amount of money raised by each candidate or Political Action Committee. An aspirational aspect of this data is to compile it in a way that allows for an analysis of the amount of money raised from each donor across multiple candidates. - Purpose: These reports are required to be filed with our office by under state law. Externally, potential candidates and campaigns may find this information useful when considering the finances of their opponents.

dataset.title: Amount of Money Expended
dataset.description: Contents: Currently this data is available for the amount of money expended by each candidate or Political Action Committee. An aspirational aspect of this data is to compile it in a way that allows for an analysis of the amount of money expended on each vendor across multiple candidates. - Purpose: These reports are required to be filed with our office by under state law. Externally, potential candidates and campaigns may find this information useful when considering the finances of their opponents.

dataset.title: Absentee Ballot Results
dataset.description: Contents: This data set includes the election results of voters who voted by Absentee Ballot in a particular election. This data can be broken down at various geographic levels. - Purpose: Internally, this data is used to calculate the overall election results. Externally, this data can be used for preparation for future elections to target voters.

dataset.title: Election Results
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is currently a text file of the election results. In the near future the data will be available on a web application and can be downloaded as a csv or excel file. - Purpose: This data is used to certify the election and can be used by potential campaigns and candidates to asses electoral chances for the future.

dataset.title: Campaign Finance Records
dataset.description: Contents: This data is a report per candidate or Political Action Committee per cycle relating to the amount of money that was raised and expended. - Purpose: These reports are required to be filed with our office by under state law. Externally, potential candidates and campaigns may find this information useful when considering the finances of their opponents.

dataset.title: Election Board Officials who worked on Election Day
dataset.description: Contents: This data is the payroll sheets signed by Election Board Officials who worked on Election Day. - Purpose: This data is used to pay the people who worked on the Election Board on E-Day. Externally, the data may be used by political parties to identify divisions where they want to recruit more Election Board workers.

dataset.title: Accessibility of Polling Places
dataset.description: Contents: This data set is a collection of the accessibility designations for each polling place. The data incldues the designation for both the building and parking. - Purpose: Internally, this data is used to identify polling places that need to be made more accessible and is reported to the state. Externally, it can be used by campaigns to make efforts to help their voters at the polls if the polling place isn't fully accessible.

dataset.title: Committee Registration Statements
dataset.description: Contents: This is a form filed when a Political Action Committee registers to operate in an election. - Purpose: These reports are required to be filed with our office by under state law. Externally, potential candidates and campaigns may find this information useful when considering the finances of their opponents or potential sources of campaign donations.
dataset.accrualPeriodicity: When Committees register with the County Board of Elections, usually prior to each Election

dataset.title: Polling Places
dataset.description: Contents: This data set contains the list of polling places. It can be organized by ward/division, accessibility rating, or type of building. - Purpose: This list is used to assign poll workers, send the machines and necessary accessibility materials, etc.
